description: Task scheduling involves allocating resources to tasks over time to optimize performance metrics such as latency, cost, and efficiency. It is particularly important in environments with varying resource capabilities and dynamic conditions.
you_have_this_if: You are experiencing delays in task completion.
You have multiple tasks with different priority levels.
Your system is under heavy load and struggling to meet deadlines.
You need to coordinate tasks in a collaborative environment.

approaches.best_for: when optimizing task scheduling for IoT applications with strict latency requirements.
approaches.key_tradeoff: This approach prioritizes cost efficiency but may require more complex implementation.

approaches.best_for: when tasks require real-time adjustments based on human actions in dynamic environments.
approaches.key_tradeoff: This technique enhances robot efficiency but may be less effective in static settings.
